Combat potions are a stat boosting potions that can only be found by opening the Deadman starter pack in Deadman: Reborn. Consuming the potion has the same effects as a regular Combat potion.

Effects[edit | edit source]

Attack and Strength boosts are calculated with: ⌊ S k i l l L e v e l × 1 10 ⌋ + 3 {\displaystyle \lfloor SkillLevel\times {\frac {1}{10}}\rfloor +3}

Level Boost Level Boost
1-9 +3 50-59 +8
10-19 +4 60-69 +9
20-29 +5 70-79 +10
30-39 +6 80-89 +11
40-49 +7 90-99 +12

'''Combat potions''' are a stat boosting [[potions]] that can only be found by opening the [[Deadman starter pack]] in [[Deadman: Reborn]]. Consuming the potion has the same effects as a regular [[Combat potion]].

==Effects==
Attack and Strength boosts are calculated with: <math>\lfloor SkillLevel \times \frac{1}{10} \rfloor + 3</math>
